name: Laser JUMP!
description:
Title: Laser JUMP!
Platform: PC Game
Genre: Platformer
Rating: T
Target Market: Ages 14+, casual gamers
Game Overview:
The game involves completing an obstacle course by firing at bowling pins. These pins spawn as you jump from one block to another in a random direction. The advanced level contains moving platforms and requires jumping between multiple platforms at once. Use your super cool laser rifle to fire at the bowling pins. After completing the course, you must travel through the portal.
Instructions:
WASD keyboard movement, R to reload, Fire button (Mouse left click) to fire a projectile.
Game Design Team:
Qadeem Qureshi – Game Designer
